degraded_warning: Degraded mode: stimulus generation was unavailable for this turn.
how_dsp_bullets: We first extract the main claim from your message.
The system searches for contradictory evidence from the web.
Those evidence snippets are fed back as guidance before response generation.
The final reply is steered to challenge assumptions instead of agreeing by default.
how_model_access_section_title: If we had direct model access
how_model_access_bullets: Steering vectors: shift hidden activations toward a disagreement/critical reasoning direction.
Preference tuning (DPO/SFT): train on examples where useful pushback is preferred over agreement.
Activation editing: modify internal representations linked to sycophancy behaviors.
Decoding-time controls: bias generation away from agreeable phrasing and toward critique cues.
Debate/self-critique training: force the model to generate counterarguments before final answers.
